Li Li.name: Healing Brew
Li Li.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 6 range for 181 (+4% per level) Health.

Li Li.name: Cloud Serpent
Li Li.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 (+4% per level) damage and heals the ally for 20 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

Li Li.name: Blinding Wind
Li Li.description: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 (+4% per level) damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

Li Li.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
Li Li.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

Li Li.name: Water Dragon
Li Li.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

Li Li.name: Fast Feet
Li Li.description: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

1.name: Free Drinks
1.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

1.name: Wind Serpent
1.description: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

1.name: Eager Adventurer
1.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 100% and increase Mana regeneration by 100% while Fast Feet is active.

4.name: Serpent Sidekick
4.description: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

4.name: Hindering Winds
4.description: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Safety Sprint
4.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Lightning Serpent
7.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.

7.name: Let's Go!
7.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Gale Force
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

13.name: Surging Winds
13.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

13.name: Mass Vortex
13.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings Of Yu'lon
16.description: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for 1.25% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Shake It Off
20.description: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.
